charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a) and 2113(d) Aggravated Bank Robbery and 18:2 Aiding and Abetting. Forfeiture Allegation. (INDICTMENT filed 03/19/2014)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 155 months. This term of imprisonment consists of 71 months on Count 1 and 84 months on Count 2, which shall be served consecutively to Count 1. This term of imprisonment shall run concurrently with the sentence previously imposed in Western District of Missouri Docket No. 14-00364-01-CR-W-DW. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of five years on Count 1, and one year on Count 2, to be served consecutively to Count 1. This term of supervised release shall run concurrently with the supervised release term previously imposed in Western District of Missouri Docket 14-00364-01-CR-W-DW. $200.00 assessment and $5,025.00 restitution.
